
snap(50,50,50)


sky(100,100,100)
fog(90,90,90) 
ground(225,225,225)

name(Frost Bite)

fadefrom(2500)

nlaps(7)

set(10,0,0,0)p
set(10,0,5000,0)
set(26,0,3000,0)pr
set(10,0,10000,0)p
set(14,0,14000,0)pt
chk(40,1750,14000,90)
set(14,3500,14000,-90)pt
set(13,5020,9430,210)p
set(14,6540,4860,90)pt
chk(40,8290,4860,90)
set(14,10040,4860,180)pt
set(12,11560,9430,150)p
set(14,13080,14000,0)pt
chk(40,14830,14000,90)
set(14,16580,14000,-90)pt
set(10,16580,10000,0)p
set(10,16580,7500,0)p
set(14,16580,3500,90)pt
set(10,20290,3500,90)p
chk(40,20290,3500,90)
set(14,24000,3500,180)pt
set(10,24000,7500,0)p
set(10,24000,12500,0)p
set(29,24000,9251,0)pr
set(29,24000,9250,180)
set(10,24000,14000,0)p
chk(40,24000,16000,0)
set(14,24000,18000,-90)pt

set(37,24150,19500,0)
set(37,23850,19500,0)

set(10,20000,18000,90)p
set(38,18800,18000,90)
set(38,18200,18000,90)
set(38,17600,18000,90)
set(38,17000,18000,90)
set(38,16400,18000,90)
set(10,16000,18000,90)p
set(38,15800,18000,90)
set(38,15200,18000,90)
set(38,14600,18000,90)
set(38,14000,18000,90)

set(10,12290,18000,90)p
set(14,8290,18000,0)pt
chk(40,8290,16000,0)
set(10,8290,14000,0)p
set(10,8290,11000,0)p
set(31,8290,10000,180)pr
set(23,8290,8500,0)
fix(41,8290,6000,-3250,0)s

set(23,8290,700,180)
set(30,8290,-1000,0)
set(10,8290,-2500,0)p
set(10,8290,-8000,0)p
chk(40,8290,-10000,0)
set(14,8290,-12000,90)pt
set(36,11100,-13800,180)
set(10,12150,-12000,90)
set(36,13000,-13800,180)ph
set(14,16000,-12000,180)pt
chk(40,16000,-10000,0)
set(12,17520,-7430,150)p
chk(40,19040,-4579,0)
set(13,17520,-1750,210)p
set(14,16000,2842,-90)pt
chk(40,14500,2842,90)
set(28,12500,2842,90)pr
set(23,11500,2842,-90)

set(23,5080,2842,90)
chk(40,5500,2842,90)
set(14,3500,2842,0)pt

set(22,3500,1000,0)
set(22,3500,400,0)p
set(22,3500,-579,0)p
set(22,3500,-1600,0)p
set(22,3500,-2000,0)

set(14,3500,-4000,180)pt
chk(40,1750,-4000,90)
set(14,0,-4000,90)pt






maxl(14,-3000,-23000)
maxt(10,22500,-10600)
maxr(14,27000,-23000)
maxb(10,-16000,-10600)
